summary.span: 以静态显示或交互式列表形式呈现项列表。

span.span: Renders a list of items as either a static display or an interactive list.

summary.span: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 ASP.NET 移动应用和网站。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此控件通过使用设备模板集和内部分页支持模板化的呈现。This control supports templated rendering by using device template sets and internal pagination. 有关详细信息，请参阅[设备筛选概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bdfeaa58-dedd-4c0d-8610-988aac0eff19)并[分页](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b4f4c4bc-226b-46ec-ae46-00497a32f4f2)。For more information, see [Device Filtering Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bdfeaa58-dedd-4c0d-8610-988aac0eff19) and [Pagination](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b4f4c4bc-226b-46ec-ae46-00497a32f4f2). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将绑定和填充数组。The following code example demonstrates how an array binds and fills a . 请注意，您可以以编程方式设置并的属性对象。Notice that you can programmatically set the and properties of the object. [!code-aspx-csharp[MobileListSample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileListSample/cs/Default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MobileListSample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileListSample/vb/Default.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 其中目标设备允许，列表项可以是未修饰名，或修饰的项目符号或编号。Where the target device permits, list items can be undecorated, or decorated with bullets or numbers. 枚举具有以下值：The enumeration has the following values: |nameName|描述Description| |----------|-----------------| ||无修饰。No decoration.| ||列表项使用项目符号进行修饰。List items are decorated with a bullet.| ||列表项使用数字进行修饰。List items are decorated with a number.| ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性更改为编号列表的列表。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to change the list to a numbered list. 将属性设置中的最后一行`Page_Load`方法。The property is set in the last line of the `Page_Load` method. 此示例摘自一个更大的示例概述。This example is part of a larger example for the overview. remarks.format: ## Remarks 当您通过使用模板来呈现列表通过 ASP.NET 事件冒泡机制调用事件处理程序。When you render a list by using templates, the event handler is called through the event-bubbling mechanism of ASP.NET. 事件处理程序传递的类型参数，其中包含有关源项的信息和生成事件的控件属性。The event handler is passed an argument of type , which contains information about the source item and the property of the control that generated the event. 这可以呈现具有多个关联交互的单个列表项。This allows you to render a single list item with multiple associated interactions. 默认呈现时，该控件提供了使用户可以单击列表项的基本用户界面 (UI)。On default rendering, the control provides a basic user interface (UI) that allows the user to click list items. 在回发时，用类型自变量调用事件处理程序，其中包含有关源项的信息。On postback, the event handler is called with an argument of type , which contains information about the source item. 此对象的属性是`null`。The property of this object is `null`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用事件以调用列表中的项的状态更改并重新计算状态总数的方法。The following code example shows how to use the event to call a method that changes the status of an item in the list and recalculates the status totals. 此示例摘自一个更大的示例概述。This example is part of a larger example for the overview. [!code-csharp[MobileListSample#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileListSample/cs/Default.aspx#2)] [!code-vb[MobileListSample#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileListSample/vb/Default.aspx#2)]

span.span: Occurs when an item in a is bound to data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中的项后创建并绑定数据，此事件处理程序设置的属性的列表项的从任意表达式。When an item in a is created and data-bound, this event handler sets the properties of the list item from arbitrary expressions. 中的项属于类型。An item in a is of type . 如绑定每个数据源项，将引发此事件。This event is raised as each data source item is bound. 这是筛选或分组中的项的最佳时间集合，通过使用或属性。This is the best time to filter or group items in the collection, by using the or Property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用事件以获取状态设置为列表的起始总数。The following code example demonstrates how to use the event to get the starting totals of status settings for the list. 此代码是为一个更大示例的一部分概述。This code is part of a larger example for the overview. [!code-csharp[MobileListSample#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileListSample/cs/Default.aspx#4)] [!code-vb[MobileListSample#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileListSample/vb/Default.aspx#4)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果此属性的值是`true`，值属性用于显示超链接的文本和属性用于指定目标 URL。If the value of this property is `true`, the value of the property is used to display the text of the hyperlink, and the property is used to specify the target URL. 这些链接将不会生成命令事件。Command events will not be generated for these links. 因此，当属性设置为`true`、因为将加载新页面，将不会调用方法通过 HTTP 调用。Thus, when the property is set to `true`, an method will not be called because a new page will be loaded through an HTTP call.
